Monster Rancher RP Board?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Writers Workshop (Writer's General Q & A): Monster Rancher RP Board?
By windrunner on Friday, December 30, 2005 - 09:52 am:

I was hoping we could put up an RPG board here or on something like proboards.com. I've wanted to have an MR text RPG for a while, but can never find anyone to RP with. Even if it were only one thread in the fiction area, I'm sure whatever RPers on here would be happy.

If this does get started, I'd like to ask that not everyone be a rancher raising monsters, but also let's not have everyone be wild monsters either.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, December 30, 2005 - 04:12 pm:

Sorry, no can do. Tecmo would shut us down like they have shut down other online MR RPGs. I don't want to lose the whole site over a game that will do nothing except cost me money.

By windrunner on Friday, December 30, 2005 - 04:33 pm:

I understand that, but I don't see why they would shut it down, or other sites, as long as it was made clear that some of the characters being played, etc, are based on characters/monsters from their game/TV series, much like with fan fiction. However, I'm not one to know all the legalities of something like this.

I've never come upon any group shutting down RP sites or fan sites because they have text-based RPs involving their show/game/product, so this is new to me. There's a first for everything, I guess.

Thank you for telling me this. ^-^
